background_description: The aquatic environment consists of a sandy seabed partially covered with various rocks and small coral structures, including purple, brown, and yellow-green branching corals. The background features larger rock formations, possibly live rock, with some algae or detritus visible, creating a natural reef or aquarium setting.
explanation: The image features a prominent Kole Tang (also known as Yelloweye Tang) with a dark body patterned with fine horizontal stripes and a striking yellow ring around its eye. A smaller, bright orange fish is visible in the upper background. Both fish exhibit distinct colors and patterns that clearly stand out against the varied textures and colors of the coral reef background, indicating a complete absence of camouflage.
